To be clear, the outline ws not updating when I switched between editors and
everytime I did the NPE would occur.
Any extra info would help, e.g. what other things you were doing prior to this.

What version of motif?  Linux or gtk?  Are you running KDE or Gnome?  I imagine 
this is the editor action bars getting out of whack somehow.

I have not been able to repeat this.
Note that SWT has released a fix (post M2) for a bug (14463) which sometimes 
caused activation callbacks when creating/disposing controls/items on motif.
It is possible (although I have no proof) the the state which triggered this 
bug was caused by such a callback.
Lynne, can close this as worksforme.
Cannot reproduce.  Note that NPE checks put in as part of [Bug 19238].
